title: IP Address Management Prefixes
description: Describe and modify the account's IP prefixes.

cidr.description: IP Prefix in Classless Inter-Domain Routing format

loa_document_id.description: Identifier for the uploaded LOA document

asn.description: Autonomous System Number (ASN) the prefix will be advertised under

links.title: Delete Prefix
links.description: Delete an unapproved prefix owned by the account.

links.title: Update Prefix Description
links.description: Modify the description for a prefix owned by the account.
links.curl:
curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/addressing/prefixes/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"description":"Internal test prefix"}'
links.response:
{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac",
    "created_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "modified_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "cidr": "192.0.2.0/24",
    "account_id": "01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823",
    "description": "Internal test prefix",
    "approved": "P",
    "loa_document_id": "d933b1530bc56c9953cf8ce166da8004",
    "on_demand_enabled": true,
    "on_demand_locked": false,
    "advertised": true,
    "advertised_modified_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "asn": 13335
  }
}

links.title: Upload LOA Document
links.description: Submit LOA document (pdf format) under the account.

links.title: Download LOA Document
links.description: Download specified LOA document under the account.

cidr.description: IP Prefix in Classless Inter-Domain Routing format

approved.description: Approval state of the prefix (P = pending, V = active)

loa_document_id.description: Identifier for the uploaded LOA document

on_demand_enabled.description: Whether advertisement of the prefix to the Internet may be dynamically enabled or disabled

on_demand_locked.description: Whether advertisement status of the prefix is locked, meaning it cannot be changed

advertised.description: Prefix advertisement status to the Internet. This field is only not 'null' if on demand is enabled

advertised_modified_at.description: Last time the advertisement status was changed. This field is only not 'null' if on demand is enabled

asn.description: Autonomous System Number (ASN) the prefix will be advertised under

object_definition.title: IP Address Management Prefixes
object_definition.description: Describe and modify the account's IP prefixes.
